parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Intermittent Notchy Steering Feel at Highway Speeds
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent notchy steering feel can cause the vehicle to veer to the left or right, requiring quick correction, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering exhibits an intermittent non-binding
the steering wheel does not self-center
the vehicle veers to the left or right

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper system can cause reduced visibility while driving, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially during heavy rain or extreme weather conditions.
symptoms: Wiper blades get stuck in the up position
blocking the windshield's view; wiper blades can get stuck in any position while wiping; rain sensor does not pick up rain at low
or heavy rain and does not engage the wipers.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause shards of glass to fall into the cabin, potentially injuring occupants or distracting the driver, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Loud explosion or gunshot-like sound from the sunroof area; sunroof glass shatters or explodes
leaving a hole or fractured pieces; no apparent external cause or damage to the surrounding area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat heater can cause burns to the skin, discomfort, and distraction while driving, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: a burning sensation is felt on the skin when using the seat heater
the seat heater emits a burning smell
